Subject: S&M AMA
Description: Join Shannon and Maggie for an 'ask me anything.' You have been to 'Sex Toys w/ S&M', now get the tough questions answered in a comfortable and safe environment. Submit your questions ahead of time via Twitter at @ShannonsParty and @BrainOfMaggie. Cards will also be available during the panel for confidentially. Mature audience.  Speakers include:Shannon Marshall, Maggie Maiville

Subject: Mechanics of Magic in Fantasy & SF
Description: Does a magical system for a story need rules? Costs, unintended consequences, social factors? What about reliability issues? How can we avoid worn-out tropes. How should magic in an RPG and story differ? Is some of the tech in SF 'magic' and should the same considerations apply?  Speakers include:
